titleStmt.title: The Proceedings at the Sessions at the Old-Baily, August the 27th and 28th, 1679 containing the several tryals of a great number of notorious malefactors, and particularly of Peter du Val & Tho. Thompson, condemned for murder, and all other remarkable occurences there : with the true number, names and respective crimes of all that received sentence of death, were burnt in the hand, together with six and thirty to be transported.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Court of Quarter Sessions of the Peace (London)
